import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function DisplayCard({flip, handleFlip, cards, decks}){ const { deckId } = useParams(); const currentDeck = decks.filter(deck => deck.id === deckId) const cardList = cards.filter(card => card.deckId === deckId) if(cardList.length <= 2){ return (

Not enough cards.

You need at least 3 cards to study. There are {cardList.length}.{deckId}

) } if(flip === false){ return ( <>

{currentDeck.name}: Study

Card {cardList[0].id} of {cardList.length}

{cardList[0].front}

) } return ( <>

{currentDeck.name}: Study

Card {cardList[0].id} of {cardList.length}

{cardList[0].front}

) }
